author: Elastic
description: Identifies AWS IAM password recovery requests. An adversary may attempt to gain unauthorized AWS access by abusing password recovery mechanisms.
false_positives: Verify whether the user identity, user agent, and/or hostname should be requesting changes in your environment. Password reset attempts from unfamiliar users should be investigated. If known behavior is causing false positives, it can be exempted from the rule.
name: AWS IAM Password Recovery Requested
note: The AWS Filebeat module must be enabled to use this rule.
